meanings.definition: Able to be handled or managed.
meanings.sent1: The small puppy was so handleable that even children could pick him up.
meanings.sent2: The handleable suitcase was easy to carry through the airport.
meanings.sent3: The handleable kitten kept jumping into the box, thinking it was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her handleable attitude towards challenges made her a great team player.
meanings.sent5: The handleable rope was perfect for the children to use in their game of tug-of-war.

meanings.definition: Capable of being dealt with or controlled.
meanings.sent1: The handleable situation at work was quickly resolved by the manager.
meanings.sent2: The handleable traffic made the commute home much smoother.
meanings.sent3: The handleable plant seemed to grow faster when given extra sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His handleable temper made him a favorite among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The handleable fire in the fireplace warmed the room on a cold winter night.
